articles.title: Covid-19 may be here to stay, could hit in waves over next two years - Livemint
articles.description: Scientists urged governments to plan for the worst-case scenario, including no vaccine availability or herd immunity.With global race for vaccine intensifying, the course of the pandemic could be influenced by a vaccine, but it is unlikely to be available unt…
articles.content: NEW DELHI: In what seems like the most probable scenario emerging from recent studies, covid-19 pandemic is here to stay and may hit in waves over the next two years with hotspots emerging in diverse geographical areas.The findings were shared by a global tea… [+3609 chars]
